      • isInCheck

        public boolean isInCheck(boolean isWhite)
        This method determines whether or not one side is in check.
        Parameters:
        isWhite - --- true means check whether white is in check; otherwise, check black.
        Returns:

      • clearDiaganolExcept

        public boolean clearDiaganolExcept(Position startPosition,
                                   Position endPosition,
                                   Piece... exceptions)
        The following method checks whether the given diaganol is completely clear, except for a given set of pieces. Observe that this doesn't guarantee a given diaganol move is valid, since this method does not ensure anything about the relative positions of the given pieces.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - - start of diaganol
        endPosition - - end of diaganol
        exceptions - - the list of pieces allowed on the diaganol
        Returns:

      • clearColumnExcept

        public boolean clearColumnExcept(Position startPosition,
                                 Position endPosition,
                                 Piece... exceptions)
        The following method checks whether the given column is completely clear, except for a given set of pieces. Observe that this doesn't guarantee a given column move is valid, since this method does not ensure anything about the relative positions of the given pieces.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - - start of column
        endPosition - - end of column
        exceptions - - the list of pieces allowed on the column
        Returns:

      • clearRowExcept

        public boolean clearRowExcept(Position startPosition,
                              Position endPosition,
                              Piece... exceptions)
        The following method checks whether the given row is completely clear, except for a given set of pieces. Observe that this doesn't guarantee a given row move is valid, since this method does not ensure anything about the relative positions of the given pieces.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - - start of row
        endPosition - - end of row
        exceptions - - the list of pieces allowed on the row
        Returns:
